forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers likely. High around 15C. Winds SW at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers along with a few thunderstorms. High around 60F. Winds SW at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers early, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 53F. SSW winds at 40 to 60 mph, decreasing to 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 60 mph.
